Title: Authorizes the dissolution and discontinuance by the town of Ballston, in the county of Saratoga, of the Jenkins Park District
Summary: Authorizes the dissolution and discontinuance by the town of Ballston, in the county of Saratoga, of the Jenkins Park District.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to dissolution of the Jenkins Park District by the town of Ballston, in the county of Saratoga
